wmndsDropdownProps.name: items
wmndsDropdownProps.description: Required. Array of option items for the dropdown. See items below.

arrayOptions.name: selected
arrayOptions.description: Sets the option as the selected.

arrayOptions.name: disabled
arrayOptions.description: Sets the option item as disabled.

wmndsDropdownProps.name: describedBy
wmndsDropdownProps.description: One or more element IDs to add to the aria-describedby attribute, used to provide additional descriptive information for screenreader users.

wmndsDropdownProps.name: classes
wmndsDropdownProps.description: Classes to add to the dropdown container.

wmndsDropdownProps.name: error
wmndsDropdownProps.description: If true, errorMessage will show. Defaults to false.

wmndsDropdownProps.name: errorMessage
wmndsDropdownProps.description: Options for the error message component. See errorMessage options below.

arrayOptions.name: id
arrayOptions.description: Id attribute to add to the error message span tag.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. Text to use within the error message. If contentHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. HTML to use within the error message
